com.msopentech.odatajclient.engine.data

Interface LinkCollectionResource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JSONLinkCollection, XMLLinkCollection

    public interface LinkCollectionResource
    REST resource for an ODataLinkCollection.
    See Also:
    ODataLinkCollection
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<URI> getLinks()
      Smart management of different JSON format produced by OData services when $links is a single or a collection property.
      URI getNext()
      Gets next link if exists.
      void setNext(URI next)
      Sets next link.

    • Method Detail

      • getLinks

        List<URI> getLinks()
        Smart management of different JSON format produced by OData services when $links is a single or a collection property.
        Returns:
        list of URIs for $links

        void setNext(URI next)
        Sets next link.
        Parameters:
        next - next link.

      • getNext

        URI getNext()
        Gets next link if exists.
        Returns:
        next link if exists; null otherwise.
